  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140044</entry>
          </identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140044</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Združitev dveh gibanj</string>
            <string language="en">Superposition of 2 movements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Superposition von 2 Bewegungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Superposition de 2 mouvements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Superposition de 2 movimentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un superposition di 2 movimenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Superposition 2 μετακινήσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Superposición de 2 movimientos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Delec se ne giblje po ravni, ampak po ukrivljeni poti. To gibanje lahko opišeno z dvema preprostima gibanjema.</string>
            <string language="en">Curved in-plane motion of particle that can be described as superposition of two motions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">združitev gibanj</string>
            <string language="en">union of motions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ukrivljena pot</string>
            <string language="en">curved path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebogene Infläche Bewegung des Partikels, die 
als Superposition von zwei Bewegungen beschrieben werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement incurvé de dans-avion de particule qui
peut être décrit comme superposition de deux mouvements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento curvado do em-plano da partícula que 
pode ser descrito como um superposition de dois movimentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento curvo dell'in-aereo della particella 
che può essere descritto come superposition di due movimenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυρτή-ΕΠΊΠΕΔΗ κίνηση του μορίου που μπορεί να 
περιγραφεί ως superposition δύο κινήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento curvado del en-plano de la partícula 
que se puede describir como superposición de dos movimientos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anschluß von Bewegungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gebogener Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">union des mouvements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voie d'accès incurvée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">união dos movimentos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trajeto curvado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unione dei movimenti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percorso curvo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ένωση των κινήσεων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυρτό μονοπάτι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">unión de movimientos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">camino curvado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
